mapper.sql: btd.ID, btd.ItemsID, btd.EnCode, btd.ItemName, btd.IsDefault, btd.DeleteMark, btd.EnabledMark, btd.AddTime, btd.AddUserID, btd.AddUserName, btd.ModifyTime, btd.ModifyUserID, btd.ModifyName, btd.DeleteName, btd.DeleteTime, btd.Remark, btd.SortCode
mapper.select:
select
from Base_Items bt,Base_ItemsDetail btd where bt.ID = btd.ItemsID and btd.DeleteMark = '0'
and bt.EnCode = '${baseItemsEnCode}'
and ( btd.EnCode like '%${keyword}%' or btd.ItemName like '%${keyword}%' )
ORDER BY btd.SortCode ASC,btd.ModifyTime DESC

select
from Base_Items bt,Base_ItemsDetail btd where bt.ID = btd.ItemsID and btd.DeleteMark = '0'
and btd.ID = '${id}'
and bt.EnCode = '${baseItemsEnCode}'

SELECT
distinct
FROM base_itemsdetail
ORDER BY SortCode asc,ModifyTime DESC LIMIT ${key_offset},${pageSize};
